title: Moonlit Path with Dog Ramps

The ground consists of black tiles and cobblestones, with noticeable gaps and imperfections that create an aged and weathered effect. Dog ramps, made of rough-hewn wooden edges, are propped up at about 30 degrees, casting long, dramatic shadows against the cobblestone. The ramps are shadowed underneath, giving a sense of depth and contrast. The horizon features outlines of distant, mist-covered hills.
